com.app.towerDefense.models

Class AdvancedCritter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.app.towerDefense.models.AdvancedCritter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CritterType, javafx.beans.Observable

    public class AdvancedCritter
extends java.util.Observable
implements CritterType
    This class will be implemented as part of the final build. This class is the advanced critter that would move on the map Contains different methhods to create and move a critter on the map selected by player
    Author:
    Amritansh Mishra
